name: SCP: Apollyon
description:
SCP: Apollyon is a free horror survival game inspired by SCP: Containment Breach and made in GMS2. The game is in active development in a very early alpha and early access, some assets are borrowed for concept or placeholder and are to be replaced with updates. 

The game's development Trello - https://trello.com/b/yR8Uopa2/scp-apollyon

The game's Discord (Report bugs, suggestions and more here) - https://discord.gg/SfMFba63

Controls 

WASD - Movement | F - Grab | Left Click - Use | Right Click - Drop | I - Inventory
